entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sandspit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:11 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sandspit Airport 6:49 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 9.0°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: SW 26 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except southwest 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 6:34 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 6:34 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Periods of rain beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early in the evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 6:34 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
